column4: Annotations
Low pitch, mid volume constant electronic bass sound with mid pitch, low volume wavering static tone

Polyphonic electronic sound which loops on a ~4 second interval from low pitch and low volume to combined low and mid pitch and mid volume. Periodic pop with hard onset and offset, mid pitch and mid volume at the beginning of each loop.
Low pitch, mid volume constant electronic bass sound continues. Wavering static sound has more pronounced fluctuations at mid volume and generally mid pitch.

Oana's voice, smooth and clear, with aspirant onset and offset, mid volume and mid pitch. Pauses within phrases and between them. Emphasis on "the subject" and "brute future," which are louder than the surrounding words and uttered with more defined onest.
High volume, harsh windy sound which begins across all pitches, then decreases volume and increases pitch gradually until inaudible

column3: Speaking voices, electronic tones and distortions
column4: Two low pitch voices distorted by static sound. The first to speak is louder than the other. Each speak with a clipped, quick cadence, with few pauses within phrases or between speakers. Phrases are short and declarative. Volume decreases; last two phrases are barely audible.

Oana's voice. Repetition of "the subject...," followed by description. Phrases tend to begin with hard onset, mid volume, and clear definition of words, and progress to lower volume and less-defined words, with longer pauses between words.
Muffled mid-pitch clicking sound, like ball bearings colliding. Accompanied by low pitch, windy sound. Becomes audible just as Oana says the words "laboured hand"
Clicking sound no longer audible. Windy sound increases in volume and variability.
Series of acute, generally low volume, metallic sounds that resonate. These occur on an inconsistant interval with inconsistent pitch.
High volume, mid-high volume hollow sounding pop across all pitches, but concentrated in the low to mid range. Hard onset and offset.
Low pitch, mid volume constant electronic bass sound continues. Wavering static sound has highly variable fluctuations at mid to high volume and high pitch.
Low pitch, mid volume constant electronic bass sound continues. Wavering static sound fluctuates around low to mid volume and generally mid pitch.

Oana's voice, speaking with a grave tone and relatively low pitch. Many phrases are broken up into groups of 2-4 words, which are spoken slowly with pauses between groups of words. Short i sounds, as in "grip" and "abyss," are extended, as are s sounds in the middle/end of words. Volume decreases and onset/offset softens as she speaks.
Gravelley, crunching sound beginning with a period of ~0.5 second. Low to mid pitch and volume. Period becomes longer and volume decreases through this interval.
Clear scratch sound with varying pitch and generally low volume. Something like a wooden stick tracing across a wooden table.
Polyphonic electronic tone crescendoes to high volume
Two fast pops, followed by a high volume, windy sound across all pitches. Volume decreases until sound is inaudible.

Mid-pitch, mid-volume consistant electronic buzzing sound. Accompanied by low-pitch buzzing sound which begins at low volume and increases in pitch and volume until a consistant, multitonal electronic sound is audiblee across all pitches. Then, volume decreases slightly until sound cuts off.
Distorted, static tone, followed by mid-pitchl, mid-volume electronic toe which increases and then decreases.

Polyphonic electronic sound which loops on a ~4 second interval from low pitch and low volume to combined low and mid pitch and mid volume. Periodic pop with hard onset and offset, mid pitch and mid volume at the beginning of each loop.

Oana's voice, speaking with a grave tone and relatively low pitch. Phrases are broken up into groups of 2 words, with pauses between words. Volume decreases and onset/offset becomes softer throughout this interval.
Polyphonic, periodic electronic tone increases to high volume, then tapers off

One mid pitch voice speaking. Little intonation (i.e. most syllables are stressed), resulting in choppy-sounding words (e.g. ve-hi-cules). Shout pauses between words. Call-and-response form (e.g. "...right? Yeah, that's what it looks like to me.") suggests two speakers, but there's only one voice. Elements that presumably refer to descriptive rather than spoken text (e.g. "unintelligible," "explicative") included within flow of speech, uttered by same speaker.

Polyphonic electronic sound which loops on a ~4 second interval from mid-low pitch, mid volume, and prominent static to low pitch and low volume. Periodic pop with hard onset and offset, mid pitch and mid volume at the end of each loop.
Low pitch, mid volume constant electronic bass sound

Oana's voice, speaking at mid pitch and mid volume. Variable groupings of 1-10 words with pauses between. Variable speaking speed.  Emphasis on "time turns deadly" through relatively high volume and pitch, as well as hard onset.
Polyphonic electronic sound continues to loop on a ~4 second interval, with added resonant brassy tone at the beginning of each loop.
Polyphonic electronic sound continues to loop on a ~4 second interval, without resonant brassy tone.
Muffled, low-mid pitch, low volume scratchy sound which fluctuates on inconsistant intervals
High volume, hollow sounding pop across all pitches, but concentrated in the low to mid range. Hard onset and offset.
Silent, except for a very low-volume resonant sound

Low pitch static sound, accompanied by mid-high pitch tone which crescendoes, spreading across all pitches and increasing in volume. The tone has a brassy, resonant character. Then, decreases in volume until inaudible.
Low pitch, mid volume constant electronic bass sound

Polyphonic electronic sound which loops on a ~4 second interval from low pitch and low volume to combined low and mid pitch and mid volume. Periodic pop with hard onset and offset, mid pitch and mid volume at the beginning of each loop.
Oana's voice, mid pitch and volume, speaking with relatively few pauses. Repetition of "end." Speech slows and decreases in volume near the end of this interval.
Various friction sounds at varying intervals. Increase in pitch and decrease in coarseness of the tones.
Oana's voice at low speed and mid-low pitch. Paises between words increase and offset softens.
Muffled acute brassy sounds which occur at various intervals and resonate. Various mid pitches and low volume.
Oana's voice, speaking quickly with generally hard onset and soft offset. Repetition of "the subject"
Distorted tone which fluctuates in mid pitch and mid volume ranges
Crunching sound at high-mid pitch and low -mid volume
Silence
